title: Benise Limon
text: Benise Limon is an undergraduate student at the University of California, Santa Barbara. She is pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Environmental Studies and a minor in Spatial Science. She hopes to have a career in spatial planning for large-scale renewable energy development.

text:

University of California, Santa Barbara | Santa Barbara, CA B.S. in Environmental Studies | Aug 2020 - June 2024
